tit.cmt: 隆盛→Takamori（誤記を訂正しました。）

sen.j: 菊池 隆盛（きくち たかもり）は、鎌倉時代の武将。
sen.e: Kakamori KIKUCHI was a busho (Japanese military commander), who lived during the Kamakura period.
Takamori KIKUCHI was a Japanese military commander who lived during the Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 隆盛→Takamori（誤記を訂正しました。）武将→a Japanese military commander
sen.e: Takamori KIKUCHI was a Japanese military commander who lived during the Kamakura period.
He was a family member of the Kikuchi clan
He was a member of the Kikuchi family.
sen.cmt: 一族→member文尾にピリオドを付けました。
sen.e: He was a member of the Kikuchi family.

sen.j: 菊池氏第11代当主とする文献もある。
sen.e: There is a literature that concludes he was the 11th family head of the Kikuchi clan.
Some literatures describe that he was the 11th head of the Kikuchi clan.
sen.cmt: シンプルな表現に変更しました。
sen.e: Some literatures describe that he was the 11th head of the Kikuchi clan.

sen.j: 菊池武房の長男と家系図にはあるが、菊池武盛と里見入道の娘との間に生まれたとの説もある。
sen.e: According the family genealogy, he was the first son of Takefusa KIKUCHI, however, there is another theory in which he was the son born between Takemori (武盛) KIKUCHI and the daughter of Nyudo SATOMI (Monk Satomi)
sen.cmt: 菊池武盛→Takemori (武盛) KIKUCHIとしました。里見入道→Nyudo SATOMI (Monk Satomi)としました。
sen.e: Although the family genealogy showed that he was the first son of Takefusa KIKUCHI, there is another theory that his parents were Takemori KIKUCHI and the daughter of Nyudo SATOMI (Monk Satomi).
sen.cmt: あるが、→Although（"Although"で始まる文に変更しました。）文尾にピリオドを付けました。
sen.e: Although the family genealogy showed that he was the first son of Takefusa KIKUCHI, there is another theory that his parents were Takemori KIKUCHI and the daughter of Nyudo SATOMI (Monk Satomi).

sen.j: 九州の地から関東の西北の上州の地に移るが、移動の理由は記されている文献がなく定かではないが、新田氏の協力があったと考えられる。
sen.e: He moved from Kyushu region to Joshu, northwestern part of the Kanto region, however, the reason of his remove is unknown to date because no description about it can be found in any literature, but it is probable that there was a support of the Nitta clan.

Although he moved from the Kyushu region to Joshu, northwestern part of the Kanto region, it is considered that he moved due to cooperation of the Nitta clan even though the reason why he moved is uncertain because any literature had no description about it.
sen.cmt: 「～が、」が二つ重なっているので、文の分割も考慮しましたが、初訳にて分割されていないので、「移動の理由～ないが」の文章を最後に置き"even though"で繋げる形にしました。
sen.e: Although he moved from the Kyushu region to Joshu, northwestern part of the Kanto region, it is considered that he moved due to cooperation of the Nitta clan even though the reason why he moved is uncertain because any literature had no description about it.

sen.j: 現在の群馬県伊勢崎市北千木町、南千木町には、菊池千本槍から名がついた千本木神社がある。
sen.e: At present, in Minami Senbongi-cho, Kitasengi-cho, Isesaki City, Gunma Prefecture, there is Senbongi-jinja Shrine, the name of which derives from Kikuchi senbon-yari (a thousand spears of the Kikuchi clan).

In between present-day Kitasengi-cho and Minamisengi-cho, Isesaki City, Gunma Prefecture, there is Senbongi-jinja Shrine which was named after Kikuchi senbon-yari (a thousand spears of the Kikuchi clan).
sen.cmt: 現在の→present-day「北千木町、南千木町」→in between Kitasengi-cho and Minamisengi-cho（一つの神社が二つの町には存在しないので、「北千木町と南千木町の間」としました。）
sen.e: In between present-day Kitasengi-cho and Minamisengi-cho, Isesaki City, Gunma Prefecture, there is Senbongi-jinja Shrine which was named after Kikuchi senbon-yari (a thousand spears of the Kikuchi clan).
